attributes.action: remove the word "honourable" from MPs titles until the MPs expenses system is changed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the flagrant abuse of taxpayer's money funding MP's lavish expenses and property portfolios I don't believe MPs have the right to use the word "honourable" in their titles until the expenses system is changed. 

I'd like to see an election called, full details of all MPs expenses published, and each party to clearly outline how they will change the expenses system in their respective manifestos. 

Then the elctorate can decide which "honourable" members it wishes to re-elect.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
